item.title: Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

go to client.java search for

WanneShop =

go thru the searches until u see something like this

} else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; // Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31;

NOTE: the wanneshop ID eg ‘Wanneshop = 31’ is in the index shops that kinda look like this
(Example)

shop = 1 @whi@F@gre@o@whi@o@gre@d @whi@a@gre@n@whi@d @whi@o@gre@t@whi@h@gre@e@whi@r @whi@s@gre@t@whi@0@gre@0@whi@f 1 1 shop = 2 Gold_&_Trimmed_Armor 1 1 2595 100 2591 100 2593 100 2597 100 2587 100 2583 1000 2585 100 2589 100 2613 100 2607 100 2609 100 2611 100 2605 100 2599 100 2601 100 2603 100 2619 100 2615 100 2617 100 2621 100 2627 100 2623 100 2625 100 2629 100 shop = 3 @whi@R@gre@a@whi@n@gre@d@whi@o@gre@m @whi@S@gre@t@whi@0@gre@0@whi@f 1 1 4511 10 4509 10 4510 10 2633 10 2635 10 2637 10 2639 10 2641 10 2643 10 775 10 1837 10 3057 10 3058 10 3059 10 3060 10 3061 10 6184 10 6185 10 6186 10 6187 10 6654 10 6655 10 6656 10 2669 10 2671 10 2673 10 2675 10 3480 1 2653 10 2655 10 2657 10 2659 10 3478 10 2661 10 2663 10 2665 10 2667 10 3479 10
the ‘Shop = 2’ is the wanne ID so say you want the Wannecode for Nuludion
it will look like this
“Code for client.java”

} else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 79; //
“Code for Shops.cfg”

shop = 79	Mod_&_Admin_Shop	2	2	15183	100	15181	100	14819	100	14868	100	14869	100	14870	100

they are examples i guess just tell me if i got something wrong

Read full topic
